Title: Bypass lock protection in Android app

CWE.name: Authentication Bypass Using an Alternate Path or Channel

Description: If an attacker has physical access to an Android smartphone without a screen lock, but with nextcloud installed and set up, they can easily access the nextcloud-files even if the nextcloud app is locked with a fingerprint or pin.
Resolution: It is recommended that users upgrade to version 3.3.0 or later.
